name: Space Lifeguard
description:
Welcome to Space Lifeguard, a 2D adventure scifi game

Some aliens are trying to destroy our civilization, our duty is to find stranded spaceships lost in the space battles with the aliens. We need to store them in our freighter and safely get them back in the space station. But be careful! You might have to fight some aliens in the preocess.

Upgrade your ship saving other spaceships to be able to fight the aliens mothership, who is approching earth. 

Save our world!
